body: Just an update here that we have a beta prototype ready for testing. In case you have already used OpenFOAM this is the right time to get involved and give a try otherwise you should wait a couple of more weeks until it's ready for inexperienced users. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vhACU8JlJgTOendpAdVYTGTmkfD9yAcYNCEnzdLQMt*leFUAxzqEVy21P1aRV9RwRKoaOZCVi6Eff8yQlZaRHa5N4bkSkpuA/butterfly.jpg)
